Dialogue: I know a spell when I see one... Snape wasn't blinking.
Sir, the second task is only hours away.
Look at you playing with your cards. Pathetic! Exams are coming.
This is a Time Turner Harry.
I've always heard Hogwarts exams were frightful...
A Patronus requires a powerful wizard.
The Chamber of Secrets has been opened... written in blood.
Harry, no way! ... You don't even know how to fly. What an idiot.
Divination is woolly; Ancient Runes is fascinating.
Ron's right Harry. You're gonna need your strength today.
McGonagall is worried. All the teachers are.
We're to be given quills with anti-cheating spells.
Ow! You stood on my foot!
I can't believe it—she's done it again...
Fudge is coming. Why aren't we leaving?
It's Snape! He's jinxing the broom!
Dean was told by Parvati... Hagrid's looking for you.
The Heir of Slytherin has returned... who is it?
Honestly, don't you two read? Philosopher's Stone is a legendary substance...
Sirius will want to hear about this.
Pleasure. You two better change into your robes... You've got dirt on your nose.
There's a reason those curses are unforgivable.
I don't like this. Not at all.
Curious. I've never seen birds like these.
No Ron, you can't! There must be another way!
At least no one on the Gryffindor team had to buy their way in.
There must be 1000 keys up there!
Books and cleverness? There are more important things.
Do what I say. Trust me.
I've read about those. When the smoke turns red, it means you've forgotten something.
I know. But it's the only plan we've got.
These tasks are brutal... I'm scared for you.
How did it go Hagrid? The hearing?
I won't be going alone—someone asked me.
We must make sure Crabbe and Goyle can't interrupt.
It was cat hair. Look at my face!
You don't use your eyes, do you? Didn't you see what it was standing on?
I went looking for the troll... I'd probably be dead.
Do you mind me trying? The Grim possibly.
These tasks test you brutally... I'm scared.
We know the truth. Please believe us.
Ronald would like me to tell you...
If you two don't mind... killed or worse, expelled!
Are you alright? You must be freezing!
You foul loathsome evil little cockroach!
It was standing on a trap door... guarding something.
You hear a voice... then Mrs. Norris ends up Petrified.
Dumbledore couldn't be fooled by an age potion.
The Egyptians used to worship cats.
But Malfoy, the Heir of Slytherin?
Nearly headless? How can you be nearly headless?
You won't make a fool of yourself. It's in your blood.
I've been here all this time.
It's a bit strange, isn't it?
This is an age line. Dumbledore drew it.
Mudblood means dirty blood... someone like me.
You foul loathsome evil little cockroach!
Good, you can help Harry... Nicholas Flamel.
It had to be a Gryffindor... unless it wasn't a student.
We’ll have to wait for the Polyjuice Potion.
Go on Harry. For goodness sake.
Do you think he's all right?
Everything's going to change now isn't it?
No one blames you Harry. Dumbledore is furious.
Your dad's dead—I know—just telling you what I saw.
Not in the restricted section. Happy Christmas.
Take better care of your pets!
We’d break fifty school rules... very dangerous.
We just learned about red caps and hinkypunks.
We've been through enough—just do it yourself.
No! With a proper wand it's too risky!
That's why he gave you chocolate.
Are you sure that's a real spell? ... Oculus Reparo. ... you're Harry Potter.
It's tricky. I've never seen a more complicated potion.
Is that really what my hair looks like?
You will be able to, won't you?
How can the Ministry not know who conjured it?
Bit early for mail, isn't it?
You'll be okay Harry. You're a great wizard.
They're not for Ginny—they're for you!
What does legend say lies within the Chamber?
Of course! Here it is! Nicholas Flamel...
Stop moving! This is Devil's Snare...
I remember reading something in Herbology.
We're not supposed to be here... It's forbidden.
Don't be silly Ron... broaden your minds.
Hagrid's our friend. Let's go ask him.
Crookshanks ignore the mean little boy.
Awful things happen to wizards who meddle with time.
Well that's good, isn't it? He'll be with his own kind.
No one ever comes in here.
And what do you plan to do if this comes up in the final exam?
What did you do to your glasses? Oculus Reparo.
It can't be Hagrid. It just can't.
It's not real, the ceiling. It's bewitched... I read about it in Hogwarts: A History.
Has anyone seen a toad? A boy named Neville's lost one.
They're going to suck out his soul!
How dare you! I can take care of myself.
If you want to kill Harry you'll have to kill us too!
The only stone in existence belongs to Flamel... that's what's under the trapdoor!
We can do this—the three of us.
But why would anyone go near that dog?
Come on. We can't be seen.
What's got your wand in a knot?
I’m not going. You go without me!
We'll have one hour before changing back.
It's not common... this is bad.
What are the three most crucial ingredients in a Forgetfulness Potion?
It's hurting again isn't it—your scar.
Next time ask me before someone else does.
If we succeed, innocent lives could be spared.
Ron you're okay. The dog—where is it?
Promise you'll write this summer. Both of you.
I think that means you owe someone an apology.
Ouch Ron that was my foot.
I had you looking in the wrong section!
Even in the wizarding world, hearing voices isn't good.
You mean You-Know-Who is out there right now in the forest?
Oh, are you doing magic? Let's see then.
There are other things defending the Stone... enchantments.
Ron, you don't think this is real wizard's chess?
Do you realize what tree this is?
Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
We're coming out the back. Go!
Oh, move over! Alohomora. Get in.
Harry you told me you'd figured the egg out weeks ago.
Oh it's so good to see you!
I got this from Millicent’s robes... checking Polyjuice.
Hot isn't it? Viktor’s getting drinks.
We're forgetting one thing... Dumbledore always feared Voldemort.
Look who it is—Madam Rosmerta. Ron fancies her.
We know about the Philosopher's Stone!
Where have you been? Off to bed both of you.
It's a cat, Ronald. It's his nature.
He lived a thousand years ago.
Feels strange to be going home.
He's a werewolf! That's why he's been missing classes.
Stop, you're going to take someone's eye out. It's Levi-o-sa.
Harry isn't going to keep it.
Devil's Snare hates sunlight! Lumos Solem!
Professor, tell us about the Chamber?
That's why Ron and I went looking for him.
